unnormalised: Breaking! Chaos ensues on Linking Road, Bandra, West, Mumbai, 400050! A massive fire broke out earlier today at a residential building located at Flat No. 201, Sai Apartments.
normalised: Breaking! Chaos ensues on Linking Road, Bandra, West, Mumbai, four zero zero zero five zero! A massive fire broke out earlier today at a residential building located at Flat Number two hundred and one, Sai Apartments.

unnormalised: Eyewitnesses report seeing smoke billowing from the 2nd floor around 10:30 AM. Residents from nearby buildings, including those at 302, Galaxy Towers, Carter Road, and Bungalow No. 5, Pali Hill, had gathered outside, visibly shaken.
normalised: Eyewitnesses report seeing smoke billowing from the second floor around ten thirty A.M. Residents from nearby buildings, including those at three zero two, Galaxy Towers, Carter Road, and Bungalow Number five, Pali Hill, had gathered outside, visibly shaken.

unnormalised: Fire trucks from the Mumbai Fire Brigade arrived swiftly, navigating the narrow lanes near Shop No. 7, Hill Road Shopping Centre. A spokesperson confirmed that the fire was brought under control in approx. 2 hours.
normalised: Fire trucks from the Mumbai Fire Brigade arrived swiftly, navigating the narrow lanes near Shop Number seven, Hill Road Shopping Centre. A spokesperson confirmed that the fire was brought under control in approximately two hours.

unnormalised: Preliminary reports suggest the cause of the fire might be a short circuit. Thankfully, no casualties have been reported so far. An investigation is underway.
normalised: Preliminary reports suggest the cause of the fire might be a short circuit. Thankfully, no casualties have been reported so far. An investigation is underway.

unnormalised: The building, with its official address as Plot No. 15, Bandra Reclamation, is currently being assessed for structural damage. Residents are being temporarily housed at a community hall near Mount Mary Church.
normalised: The building, with its official address as Plot Number fifteen, Bandra Reclamation, is currently being assessed for structural damage. Residents are being temporarily housed at a community hall near Mount Mary Church.

unnormalised: One resident, Ms. Sharma, whose address is listed as A-10, Sea View Apartments, expressed relief that everyone was safe. "It was terrifying," she said, "The smoke was everywhere."
normalised: One resident, Ms. Sharma, whose address is listed as A-ten, Sea View Apartments, expressed relief that everyone was safe. "It was terrifying," she said, "The smoke was everywhere."

unnormalised: More updates to follow as the situation unfolds. Local authorities are advising people to avoid the area, specifically the stretch between KFC on Linking Road and the Bandstand Promenade. Further details will be released from the Bandra Police Station. Contact the station house officer if you require more information or support.
normalised: More updates to follow as the situation unfolds. Local authorities are advising people to avoid the area, specifically the stretch between K-F-C on Linking Road and the Bandstand Promenade. Further details will be released from the Bandra Police Station. Contact the station house officer if you require more information or support.
